title: Strengthening Instructional Design Practical Competencies: Asynchronous Discussions and Assignments for Online Teacher Professional Development

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational educational theories and experience with online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners participate in weekly asynchronous discussions over six weeks and derive at least three methods to apply language teaching theories to actual classes through interaction with peer teachers.

Learners complete weekly assignments (critical paper analysis, case study reports) over four weeks to evaluate core elements of online teacher professional development (critical thinking, self-directed learning).

Within two weeks after the course, learners document three or more specific educational practice change cases (e.g., lesson design improvements, assessment method innovations, learner engagement strategies) in their portfolios, including pre-post comparison data and performance metrics (e.g., 15% increase in learner satisfaction, 20% rise in class participation) for each case.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
